channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pelosi Was Bad. What Follows Could Be Worse
item.description: The San Francisco progressive was the most effective Democratic legislator since LBJ.

item.title: NR Is My Debate Training
item.description: There’s just no substitute for reading National Review .

item.title: Nigerian Girls Are Being Kidnapped
item.description: Islamist terrorists have inflicted a decade of religiously motivated sexual violence on Christian women and girls.

item.title: Rep. Stefanik to announce run for New York governor
item.description: Republican U.S. Rep. Elise Stefanik is expected to announce a run for New York governor Friday, according to two people familiar with her plans.

item.title: Reelected Kansas Mayor Faces Charges Of Voting As Noncitizen
item.description: When registering to vote, the only proof of citizenship is checkmark on a postcard, indicating yes or no, “Are you a U.S. citizen?”

item.title: Here Are 7 Key Moments From Justice Barrett’s Latest Sit-Down Interview
item.description: 'You can't criticize one branch for being outside of its lane by veering outside of your lane to take it down.'

item.title: 'Clear and present danger': Liberal firebrand ready to make conservatives miss Pelosi
item.description: Conservatives cheering former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's retirement after 40 years in Congress may want to be careful what they wish for.
